snippet.title: Timespinner - Official Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Live on Kickstarter! - http://kck.st/TkHdQf
Live on Greenlight! - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=268593652
http://www.TimespinnerGame.com
@LunarRayGames

Timespinner is a beautifully pixelated 2D Metroidvania Platformer about a young woman who travels through time to destroy the empire that killed her family. At its heart, the game is a child of the great pixelated classics of the SNES and PS1 age. From the rich story worlds of Star Ocean, the expansive gothic castle exploration in Castlevania, and the tight gameplay of Megaman X, Timespinner seeks to weave all of these elements into one amazing game.
